net.sf.rcer.conn.locales
Class Locale

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.rcer.conn.locales.Locale

public class Locale
extends java.lang.Object

A single SAP Locale as defined by a locale element of the extension point net.sf.rcer.conn.saplocales. Use the LocaleRegistry to obtain instances of this class.

Author:
vwegert

          A Converter that implements the String to Locale conversion.

          A Converter that implements the Locale to String conversion.
